channel.title: Teleporting out of Safezone [PI]

item.title: Teleporting out of Safezone [PI]
item.dc:creator: @P_A_N_I_C P A N I C
item.description:
@P_A_N_I_C wrote:

try this:

if(c.inWild()) { c.teleblock = true; c.sendMessage("You can't teleport in the Wilderness!"); return; }
sorry if it doesn’t work i guessed on the “c.teleblock = true;” part.
Should work thou.

Read full topic

item.title: Teleporting out of Safezone [PI]
item.dc:creator: @poop_on_u234 poop on u234
item.description:
@poop_on_u234 wrote:

Ok, so I made a pvp zone and safe zone but its recognizing the safe zone as wilderness. How would I make it so people can teleport out of the safe zone.

I have this in my Playerassistant.java to stop people from teleporting out of the wilderness.

if(c.inWild()) { c.sendMessage("You can't teleport in the Wilderness!"); return; }

Read full topic
